text.en: Throw all the 1x1 and 1x2 beams all over the challenge field. Build a robot that sweeps all the 'snow' off the field. Pile the beams up at the green corner.

Start sweeping from the start point.
Use only one robot.
Robots should only be built from parts from your Challenge Kit.

You could clean the field within 10 minutes. = Good job! Another try?
You needed 7 minutes to sweep all the 'snow'. = Excellent job! Do you want to try again?
You cleared the field within 5 minutes. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
Finished within 10 minutes = 5 points
Finished within 7 minutes = 10 points
Finished within 5 minutes = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
